languages.text: "В этом логове ереси прячется наш кровный враг. Хелбрут по имени Крик скверны, древний и злобный предатель. Он заступил нам дорогу на подступах к Машинному храму и сразил сотни отважных героев. Ему нанесли страшную рану, но чудовищу удалось ускользнуть. Пора настигнуть и прикончить эту гадину!"

"Our mortal foe lurks within this den of heresy. A Helbrute by the name of Doomscream, an ancient and vicious traitor. He barred our advance when we were approaching the Machine Cathedral and felled hundreds of brave champions. A terrible wound he took, but the beast still escaped our grasp. 'Tis time we cornered him and ended his vile existence!"
languages.original_text: "В этом логове ереси прячется наш кровный враг. Хелбрут по имени Крик скверны, древний и злобный предатель. Он заступил нам дорогу на подступах к Машинному храму и сразил сотни отважных героев. Ему нанесли страшную рану, но чудовищу удалось ускользнуть. Пора настигнуть и прикончить эту гадину!"

He barred our advance when we were approaching the Machine Temple and felled hundreds of brave champions. A terrible wound he took, but the beast still escaped from our grasp. 'Tis time we cornered him and ended his vile existence!"
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: “我们的宿敌就潜伏在这座异端的巢穴里。那是一头名叫‘灾啸’的地狱兽，是个古老而邪恶的叛徒。当我们接近机械大教堂时，那个叛徒拦住了我们的去路，还杀了几百个勇敢的战士。他在我们手上受了重伤，但还是逃掉了。是时候把他逼入绝境，彻底结束他的罪恶了！”
languages.original_text: "Our mortal foe lurks within this den of heresy. A Helbrute by the name of Doomscream, an ancient and vicious traitor. He barred our advance when we were approaching the Machine Cathedral and felled hundreds of brave champions. A terrible wound he took, but the beast still escaped our grasp. 'Tis time we cornered him and ended his vile existence!"

traits.locale_text: “我们的宿敌就潜伏在这座异端的巢穴里。那是一头名叫‘灾啸’的地狱兽，是个古老而邪恶的叛徒。当我们接近机械神殿时，那个叛徒拦住了我们的去路，还杀了几百个勇敢的战士。他在我们手上受了重伤，但还是逃掉了。是时候把他逼入绝境，彻底结束他的罪恶了！”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « Notre ennemi juré se cache dans cet antre d'hérétiques. C'est un traître ancien et cruel, un Métabrutus surnommé le Fléau Hurlant. Il nous a barré la route quand nous approchions de la Cathédrale de la Machine et a tué des centaines de courageux champions. Bien que nous l'ayons grièvement blessé, il a réussi à nous échapper. Il est temps pour nous de l'acculer et de mettre un terme à son ignoble existence ! »
languages.original_text: "Our mortal foe lurks within this den of heresy. A Helbrute by the name of Doomscream, an ancient and vicious traitor. He barred our advance when we were approaching the Machine Cathedral and felled hundreds of brave champions. A terrible wound he took, but the beast still escaped our grasp. 'Tis time we cornered him and ended his vile existence!"

traits.locale_text: « Notre ennemi juré se cache dans cet antre d'hérétiques. C'est un traître ancien et cruel, un Métabrutus que l'on nomme le Fléau Hurlant. Il nous a barré la route quand nous approchions du Temple de la Machine et a tué des centaines de courageux champions. Bien que nous l'ayons gravement blessé, il a réussi à nous échapper. Il est temps pour nous de l'acculer et de mettre un terme à son ignoble existence ! »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「この異端の巣窟には宿命の敵が潜んでいる。昔からいる凶悪な裏切り者、ドゥームスクリームという名のヘルブルートだ。我々が機械大聖堂に近づいたときに奴は我々の進軍を妨害し、何百人もの勇敢な戦士たちを倒した。奴はひどい傷を負ったが、それでもあの獣は我々の手から逃れた。今こそ彼を追い詰め、あの卑劣な存在をこの世界から消し去ってやろう！」
languages.original_text: "Our mortal foe lurks within this den of heresy. A Helbrute by the name of Doomscream, an ancient and vicious traitor. He barred our advance when we were approaching the Machine Cathedral and felled hundreds of brave champions. A terrible wound he took, but the beast still escaped our grasp. 'Tis time we cornered him and ended his vile existence!"

traits.locale_text: 「この異端の巣窟には宿命の敵が潜んでいる。昔からいる凶悪な裏切り者、ドゥームスクリームという名のヘルブルートだ。我々が機械大聖堂に近づいたときに奴は我々の進軍を妨害し、何百人もの勇敢な戦士たちを倒した。奴はひどい傷を負ったが、それでもあの獣は我々の手から逃れた。今こそ彼を追い詰め、あの卑劣な存在をこの世界から消し去ってやろう！」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «Nuestro enemigo mortal acecha en este antro de herejía. Es un Bruto Infernal llamado Doomscream, un traidor antiguo y sádico. Nos obstruyó el paso cuando nos acercábamos a la Catedral Máquina y abatió a cientos de valientes campeones. Logramos infligirle una herida tremenda, pero a pesar de eso escapó de nuestras manos. ¡Es hora de acorralarlo y poner fin a su inmunda existencia!».
languages.original_text: "Our mortal foe lurks within this den of heresy. A Helbrute by the name of Doomscream, an ancient and vicious traitor. He barred our advance when we were approaching the Machine Cathedral and felled hundreds of brave champions. A terrible wound he took, but the beast still escaped our grasp. 'Tis time we cornered him and ended his vile existence!"

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro enemigo mortal acecha en este antro de herejía. Es un Bruto Infernal llamado Balescream, un traidor antiguo y sádico. Nos obstruyó el paso cuando nos acercábamos al Templo Máquina y abatió a cientos de valientes campeones. Logramos infligirle una herida tremenda, pero a pesar de eso se nos escapó. ¡Es hora de acorralarlo y poner fin a su inmunda existencia!».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Unser sterblicher Feind lauert in diesem Pfuhl der Ketzerei. Ein Höllenschlächter namens Unheilsschrei, ein uralter und fürchterlicher Verräter. Er hat unseren Vormarsch auf die Maschinenkathedrale blockiert und hunderte von mutigen Streitern gefällt. Eine schreckliche Wunde wurde ihm zugefügt, doch die Bestie hat sich unserem Griff dennoch entzogen. Es wird Zeit, dass wir ihn in die Enge treiben und seiner schändlichen Existenz ein Ende bereiten!"
languages.original_text: "Our mortal foe lurks within this den of heresy. A Helbrute by the name of Doomscream, an ancient and vicious traitor. He barred our advance when we were approaching the Machine Cathedral and felled hundreds of brave champions. A terrible wound he took, but the beast still escaped our grasp. 'Tis time we cornered him and ended his vile existence!"

traits.locale_text: "Unser sterblicher Feind lauert in diesem Pfuhl der Ketzerei. Ein Höllenschlächter namens Unheilsschrei, ein uralter und fürchterlicher Verräter. Er hat unseren Vormarsch auf den Maschinentempel blockiert und hunderte von mutigen Streitern gefällt. Eine schreckliche Wunde wurde ihm zugefügt, doch die Bestie hat sich unserem Griff dennoch entzogen. Es wird Zeit, dass wir ihn in die Enge treiben und seiner schändlichen Existenz ein Ende bereiten!"
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Can düşmanımız, bu kâfirlik ininde pusuda bekliyor. Belanarası isimli bir Tamu Kaçkını, eski ve amansız bir hain. Makine Katedrali'ne ilerlerken yolumuza taş koydu ve gözü pek yüzlerce müdafinin canına mal oldu. Bu esnada ağır bir yara aldı ancak yaratık pençelerimizden kaçmayı başardı. Bu sefer köşeye sıkıştırıp habis yaşamına son verdik!"
languages.original_text: "Our mortal foe lurks within this den of heresy. A Helbrute by the name of Doomscream, an ancient and vicious traitor. He barred our advance when we were approaching the Machine Cathedral and felled hundreds of brave champions. A terrible wound he took, but the beast still escaped our grasp. 'Tis time we cornered him and ended his vile existence!"
